cookie-banner.message: This website uses cookies to enhance the user experience.

privacy.title: Privacy & Cookie Policy
privacy.intro: At Trempat Burger, your privacy is important to us. This page explains what data we collect, how we use cookies, and your rights regarding your information.
privacy.what-info-analytics: Anonymous analytics data (e.g., page views, device type). We do not store any personal data.
privacy.what-info-contact: We do not collect or store any personal data from orders or contact forms.
privacy.cookies-lang-theme: Remember your language and theme preferences
privacy.cookies-experience: Improve your experience on our site
privacy.cookies-consent: Non-essential cookies (like analytics) are only set after you give consent via our cookie banner.
privacy.rights-withdraw: You can withdraw cookie consent at any time by clearing your browser cookies.
privacy.rights-request: We do not store any personal data. All analytics is anonymous.
privacy.contact-text: For privacy-related questions, please email us at

brand.name: Trempat Burger
brand.slogan:
This ain’t just eating, it’s sinning.
Welcome to Trempat!
brand.description:
Trempat Burger ain’t your average burger joint.
Here, everything’s turned up loud: juicy buns, perfectly cooked dry-aged beef, and recipes that flip the usual upside down.
We’re all about bold mashups, toppings that hit different, and that cheeky rebel twist that makes every burger one of a kind. Doesn’t matter if you dig in at the spot, grab it to go, or get it dropped at your door—every Trempat is built to make you say “damn, that’s insane” from the very first bite.
In short: burgers with soul, no filters, and a whole lotta rock’n’roll.

not-found.title: Page not found
not-found.subtitle: Looks like this page got lost on the way.

about.title: About Trempat Burger
about.we-are:
We’re Judit and Miki the guilty pair behind the fact that in Cardedeu, nobody can ever look at a burger the same way again.
Miki’s all about perfection, obsessed with nailing that exact point where every bite blows your mind.
Judit’s the one who doesn’t let a single detail slip: new recipes, wild ideas, and that rebel twist that turns an order into an experience.
Together, we pour in passion, dedication, and a whole lot of heart so every burger reflects who we are: real, close, and madly in love with what we do.
Here, we don’t just make burgers… we serve up a shot of happiness between two buns. Welcome to Trempat Burger, where coming back isn’t a sin—it’s pretty much mandatory!

contact.title: Where are we?
contact.description: Fill in the form to send us a message.

form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject
form.error: Error sending the message. Please try again

choose-your-burger.title: Choose your burger
choose-your-burger.description: Pick your burger from all our options. You won’t be disappointed.

customize-it.title: Customize it
customize-it.description: Choose your patty: smash, double, crispy chicken or vegan. Add your favorite extras and sauces!

add-sides.title: Pick your sides
add-sides.description: Chicken wings, nachos, fries and more... we’ve thought of everything.

add-desserts.title: Save some room
add-desserts.description: And don’t forget dessert... you won’t regret it! We promise.

checkout.title: Place your order
checkout.description: Order through the link and we’ll take care of the rest.

enjoy.title: Sit back & enjoy
enjoy.description: Enjoy your meal at home or pick it up at the restaurant.

croquetesdanecalestilpekines.name: Duck Croquettes Pekin Style
croquetesdanecalestilpekines.description: 5 pcs, super creamy, homemade with fresh milk, slow-cooked duck leg and Peking sauce

pollastrefregit.name: Fried Chicken
pollastrefregit.description: Extra crispy, previously spiced, marinated and fried with panko. 3 pcs

flordecebaatempura.name: Tempura Onion Flower
flordecebaatempura.description: Served with truffle mayo, perfect for sharing

aletsdepollasteasiatiques.name: Asian Chicken Wings
aletsdepollasteasiatiques.description: 6 slow-cooked chicken wings glazed with our Asian sauce, oven-finished and served with wakame salad, lime zest and yuzu mayo

natxosambsalsadecheddartrufat.name: Nachos with Truffled Cheddar
natxosambsalsadecheddartrufat.description: Nachos with Truffled Cheddar Sauce, guacamole, pickled jalapeños and cider-grenadine pickled onions

triplebaco.name: TRIPLE BACON
triplebaco.description: Double cheddar cheese, tomato & jalapeño relish, bacon jam caramelized with agave, and smoked bacon mayo

iberica.name: IBÉRICA
iberica.description: Iberian pork rib burger, slow-cooked and glazed with smoked BBQ. Double cheddar cheese, bacon jam, pickled jalapeños, smoked mayo and chipotle ketchup

vegana.name: VEGAN
vegana.description: 100% vegan artichoke burger, vegan bun, vegan cheddar, lettuce, caramelized onion, pickle relish, crispy vegan bacon and tartar sauce

cabrona.name: CABRONA
cabrona.description: Smoked mayo, beer BBQ, goat cheese, gouda cheese, tomato jam and crispy guanciale

cheesey.name: CHEESEY
cheesey.description: Triple cheese: Gouda, Cheddar and Monterrey Jack, bacon jam, pickle relish, Japanese mayo and Jack Daniel’s BBQ

campera.name: COUNTRY
campera.description: Gouda cheese, grilled onion, lettuce, fried egg, crispy bacon and truffle mayo

classica.name: CLASSIC
classica.description: Gouda cheese, raw onion, lettuce, pickles, smoked mustard mayo and organic ketchup

porca.name: PULLED PORK
porca.description: Monterrey Jack cheese, caramelized onion, pickles, pulled pork, double crispy bacon, Emy sauce and smoked BBQ

burgertemporada.name: BURGER OF THE MONTH
burgertemporada.description: Check our social media to see this month’s burger

combo.name: Combo
combo.description: Mix of classic fries and sweet potato

cheesecake.name: Goat Cheese and Lotus Cheesecake
cheesecake.description: Creamy triple-cheese cheesecake made with mascarpone, goat cheese and cream cheese, on a Lotus biscuit base topped with Lotus spread

bunyolsxoco.name: CHOCOLATE & CHILLI FRITTERS
bunyolsxoco.description: Delicious homemade chocolate fritters with chilli. Lightly spicy and bursting in your mouth. We recommend eating them in one bite. Served in 3 pieces. May contain traces of nuts and soy, as the chocolate we use is produced in a facility that handles these allergens.

cookienutella.name: NUTELLA COOKIE
cookienutella.description: Spectacular homemade 125 g cookie, generously filled with Nutella. If you love Nutella, this is your dessert. May contain traces of soy and nuts, as the chocolate we use is produced in a facility that handles these allergens.

cheescakesingluten.name: GLUTEN-FREE GOAT CHEESE CHEESECAKE
cheescakesingluten.description: Our triple-cheese cheesecake made with goat cheese, mascarpone and cream cheese, now GLUTEN-FREE. ALWAYS AVAILABLE.

fondantxoco.name: CHOCOLATE & PRALINE FONDANT
fondantxoco.description: Homemade dark chocolate cake with hazelnut and almond praline. We recommend heating it in the microwave for 20 seconds at full power to achieve a slightly warm, molten center. May contain traces of gluten (the chocolate we use is produced in a facility that handles gluten).

allergens.title: Allergens
allergens.description: Please inform our staff if you have any food allergy or intolerance. We’ll be happy to help you choose suitable options.

errors.name: Error
errors.title: Oops! An unexpected error occurred.
errors.message2: If the problem persists, contact us
